description: Enable natural language access to Brazilian treasury bond data through MCP-compatible clients. Query market data, bond details, and search/filter bonds using everyday language. Benefit from smart caching to reduce API calls while ensuring data freshness.

useMcpCache.description: Enable in-memory cache for API responses

tools.name: market_data
tools.description: Retrieves general market data from Tesouro Direto, including opening/closing times and status

tools.name: bond_data
tools.description: Retrieves detailed data for a specific bond from Tesouro Direto

code.description: The numeric code of the bond to retrieve

tools.name: search_bonds
tools.description: Search for bonds by type (ANY,SELIC, IPCA, PREFIXADO) or maturity date range

bondType.description: Filter by bond type (ANY, SELIC, IPCA, or PREFIXADO)

maturityAfter.description: Filter bonds maturing after this date (YYYY-MM-DD)

maturityBefore.description: Filter bonds maturing before this date (YYYY-MM-DD)
